cast.name: 玛缇妲·拉姆齐 Matilda Ramsay
乔·巴斯提亚尼齐 Joe Bastianich

this_title: MasterChef Junior: Home for the Holidays Season 1
introduction: In this festive two-night special, Gordon Ramsay hosts nine talented young chefs competing in a holiday-themed culinary showdown. The contestants will whip up dishes inspired by Christmas, Hanukkah, Kwanzaa, Lunar New Year, and other seasonal celebrations. Judges Gordon Ramsay, Tilly Ramsay, Aarón Sánchez, and Daphne Oz will determine the champion, who will receive a $25,000 grand prize, a premium Viking Kitchen package, and a unique MasterChef snow globe trophy. This season, every junior chef will depart with a special kitchen-related gift, and the second-place finisher will be awarded their own Viking Kitchen package.
chinese_title: MasterChef Junior: Home for the Holidays Season 1
